<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/account-members/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



    Update an existing account member in the Account.

    ### Permissions
    * `account-member:write`

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>

  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}

>
  
</RequestSchema>
